Schedule
docs.text: Description Course Materials Assignment Deadline Introduction to Network Science. Structure of Graphs Lecture 1 assignment_0.ipynb Power law and Scale-free networks Lecture 2 assignment_1.ipynb 15.02 (23:59 MSK) Random Graphs, Generative Models Lecture 3 Node centrality and ranking on networks Lecture 4 Motifs, Graphlets, Structural similarity Lecture 5 Community detection Lecture 6 assignment_2.ipynb 12.03 (23:59 MSK) Graph Embeddings Lecture 7 assignment_3.ipynb 19.03 (23:59 MSK)
